## mole projects add

Add a new project

### Synopsis

Adds a new project.
	Name and repository are required.

```
mole projects add [name] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -b, --branch string        Branch *required
  -d, --description string   Description
  -h, --help                 help for add
  -r, --repository string    Repository URL *required
```
